Bridge Construction and Repair.definition: Projects involving the construction, replacement, or repair of bridges.
Bridge Construction and Repair.text_example: A project to replace an existing bridge with a new structure.

Roadway Rehabilitation and Resurfacing.definition: Projects focused on rehabilitating or resurfacing existing roadways, including milling, paving, and overlay work.
Roadway Rehabilitation and Resurfacing.text_example: A project to resurface a section of highway with new asphalt.

Traffic and Pedestrian Infrastructure.definition: Projects that improve traffic flow, pedestrian safety, and accessibility, including roundabouts, sidewalks, and traffic signals.
Traffic and Pedestrian Infrastructure.text_example: A project to construct a new roundabout to improve traffic flow and safety.

Maintenance and Upkeep.definition: Projects related to the routine maintenance and upkeep of existing infrastructure, including mowing, litter removal, and guardrail repair.
Maintenance and Upkeep.text_example: A contract for regular mowing and litter removal along a highway.

Drainage and Water Management.definition: Projects focused on improving drainage, water management, and flood relief, including culvert installation and storm sewer work.
Drainage and Water Management.text_example: A project to install a new culvert to improve drainage and prevent flooding.

Intelligent Transportation Systems (ITS).definition: Projects that involve the implementation or upgrade of intelligent transportation systems, including smart traffic signals and data collection systems.
Intelligent Transportation Systems (ITS).text_example: A project to install a new intelligent transportation system to improve traffic flow and safety.

Landscaping and Environmental.definition: Projects related to landscaping, environmental mitigation, and wildlife conservation, including tree planting and habitat restoration.
Landscaping and Environmental.text_example: A project to plant trees and restore habitats along a highway corridor.

Utility and Facility Upgrades.definition: Projects that involve the upgrade or replacement of utilities, facilities, and other infrastructure, including water mains, lighting, and signage.
Utility and Facility Upgrades.text_example: A project to upgrade the lighting and signage along a highway.
